Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Legally \Le"gal*ly\, adv. In a legal manner. [1913 Webster]
legally adv 1: by law; conforming to the law; "we are lawfully wedded now" [syn: {lawfully}, {wrongfully}, {de jure}] [ant: {unlawfully}] 2: in a legal manner; "he acted legally"
